title: Fix custom prices for sports stickers

requirements.summary: Fix the custom sticker pricing functionality specifically for sports stickers to ensure custom prices can be set, saved, and displayed correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Custom prices can be set for sports stickers in the custom sticker creation form
Custom prices are saved correctly to the backend for sports stickers
Custom prices display correctly in the stickers gallery for sports items
Custom prices appear correctly in the cart for sports stickers
Price conversion between rupees (frontend display) and paise (backend storage) works correctly for sports stickers

file_operations.description: Review and fix the price conversion logic to ensure custom prices are properly converted from rupees to paise (multiply by 100) before submission to the backend for all categories including sports stickers. Verify that the price input accepts decimal values and the conversion applies consistently to both table tennis and badminton categories in the sports category.

Review and fix the price display logic to ensure stored prices in paise are correctly converted to rupees (divide by 100) for display with proper decimal formatting and currency symbol (₹). Ensure the conversion works consistently for all categories including sports stickers (table tennis and badminton).

Review and verify the price display logic for custom stickers in the cart to ensure prices stored in paise are correctly converted to rupees for display. Fix any inconsistencies in price formatting for sports category stickers, ensuring proper decimal formatting and currency symbol display.

requirements.summary: Verify that the CustomStickerForm correctly converts custom prices from rupees to paise for all product categories including sports items
acceptanceCriteria: Price input in CustomStickerForm accepts decimal values for rupees
Price conversion multiplies by 100 to convert rupees to paise before backend submission
Conversion logic works consistently for both table tennis and badminton categories

file_operations.description: Verify the price input field accepts decimal values and ensure the conversion logic multiplies the input value by 100 to convert rupees to paise before calling createCustomSticker. Add validation to ensure the conversion applies consistently regardless of the selected category, including both table tennis and badminton under the sports category.

requirements.summary: Verify CustomStickerCard correctly converts stored prices from paise to rupees for display across all sports categories
acceptanceCriteria: Prices display with proper decimal formatting (divided by 100)
Price display is consistent for both table tennis and badminton stickers

file_operations.description: Verify the price display logic divides the stored paise value by 100 to convert to rupees, formats with two decimal places, and includes the ₹ currency symbol. Ensure this conversion and formatting works consistently for all sticker categories including sports (table tennis and badminton).
